casebody.data:
WILLIAMS
v.
INSURANCE COMPANY. No. 712PA05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 11, 2006. George L. Simpson, III, for Nationwide Mut. Ins. Co. Matthew S. Sullivan, Thomas J. White, III, Kinston, Gregory E. Floyd, K. Edward Greene, Raleigh, for Debbie & Ashley Williams. Roger A. Askew, Jodee S. Larcade, Raleigh, for NC Asso. of Defense Attorneys. Holly M. Bryan, for NCATL.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of July 2006 by NCATL for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of July 2006."
